definition: to live/to dwell/to stay/to reside/to stop/(suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)

sentences.english: The study was supported by Dainippon Sumitomo Pharma, which discovered zonisamide.
sentences.chinese: 該研究由發現唑尼沙胺的住友製藥資助。

sentences.english: On the other hand, Sumitomo has a rapidly growing business in China and is solidly profitable.
sentences.chinese: 而另一反面，住友在中國業務增長迅速，且連續盈利。
